title: Letterpress Serif Typeface
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724114054im_/http:/typophile.com/files/RG-k_close_6040.jpg)

Hello! Please let me know if you can identify this face!

Thanks.

Best,

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [RG-k\_close.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724114054/http:/typophile.com/files/RG-k_close.jpg) | 48.22 KB |
author: projectspace

comments.content: It's some cut of Caslon. Can you tell us the age of the sample, which would help narrow it down?

More letters would be helpful. Especially some of the upper case ones. And knowing more about the source of the image, and its age would also help.

- Mike Yanega

It looks like **[ITC Founders Caslon](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724114054/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/founders-caslon/)** (probably #12 or #30) but it's a terrible digitization

**[Caslon Old Face](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724114054/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Bitstream&ffam=CaslonOldFace%20BT%20-%20Roman&fid=f622bb15bd5bed0bc2a68610aacabb96&fsize=60&text=spells%2C%20recurrent%20hallucin%20attempted%20seduction%20by&wrap=2)** from Bitstream also looks close
